posts.title: Logitech Vertical Ergonomic Mouse
posts.content: Logitech is looking to make your mouse using experience as comfortable as possible with their innovative vertical ergonomic mouse. The bold design places your hand at a unique 57-degree vertical angle – mimicking a natural handshake position.

posts.title: Rapid Ramen Noodle Cooker
posts.content: Prepare your favorite noodle based meal in a fraction of the time by making it on this rapid Ramen noodle cooker. This compact dishwasher safe bowl is designed to perfectly fit a block of Ramen noodles and fully cook them in just 3 minutes.

posts.title: Lighter Blowtorch Attachment
posts.content: Give your disposable lighter some extra juice by turning it into a mini blowtorch using the lighter blowtorch attachment.  Once fastened to the top of the lighter, it creates a bright blowtorch styled flame capable of reaching temperatures of up to 2300 Fahrenheit.

posts.title: Old Man Face Mask
posts.content: Transform from a young buck to a decrepit old geezer in mere seconds by putting on this old man face mask. The mask is made from a comfortable and breathable fabric that wicks away moisture and comes with an ultra realistic design that’ll fool anyone.

posts.title: Inflatable Bumper Soccer
posts.content: Bring the brutality of football to the graceful game of soccer by playing a game of inflatable bumper soccer. In this hybrid sport, players are encased by an enormous inflatable ball that lets you bump, tackle, and push down opponents without ever injuring them.

posts.title: The Art Of Rick & Morty Book
posts.content: Expand your knowledge and appreciation of the infinite Rick & Morty multiverse by reading The Art Of Rick & Morty book. You’ll gain access to intimate commentary from the show’s creators in addition to all sorts of insider information guaranteed to intrigue and amaze.

posts.title: Barbecue Fire Starter
posts.content: Heat up your charcoal grill to cooking temperatures in mere minutes with the intense heat produced by the barbecue fire starter. The fire starter creates a meat-searing inferno that is ideal for easily cooking any meal to perfection or starting up a campfire.

posts.title: Self Stirring Mug
posts.content: Make your hectic mornings run a little smoother by preparing your coffee with this self stirring mug. At the push of a button, this unique mug automatically begins to mix the contents within – perfect for lazy tea and coffee drinkers everywhere.

posts.title: Golf Club Drink Dispenser
posts.content: Don’t let your alcohol addiction slow down your active lifestyle – now you can play a round of golf and stay drunk off your ass at the same time with the golf club drink dispenser. The club dispenser allows you to discretely sneak a drink or two as you take on the golf course.

posts.title: Nasal Rinsing System
posts.content: Relieve congestion without resorting to pharmaceuticals by using this nasal rinsing system. It powers water through your nose, guiding it back out through a gentle suction motion that’ll leave your nasal passages feeling completely unobstructed.

posts.title: Cat Toilet Training System
posts.content: Rid your home of that nasty litter box smell with the toilet training system. Within eight short weeks your cat will leave his primitive ways behind and learn to do his business in a toilet like a refined feline. It’s a win-win for everyone except your cat-poop-eating dog.

posts.title: Tactical LED Flashlight Kit
posts.content: Transform the dead of night into day by illuminating what’s in front of you using this tactical LED flashlight kit. It features a sturdy water-resistant design, comes with 2 rechargeable batteries and delivers a bright 1,200 lumen beam of light at distances up to 700 feet.
